short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 网址二维码生成器, 扫一扫在手机上打开网页
short.en: Simple URL QrCode, scan to view on your phone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 手机输入网址很不方便，此插件自动生成浏览器地址栏网址的二维码，扫一扫就可以在手机上打开网址。
long.en: This extension can easy and fast make your url  in browser address bar to QR code. Scanning it on your phone to view.
